sentences.en: If I were you, I would consult a doctor. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그 일을 다시 생각해보는 것이 좋겠어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I would reconsider that decision if I were you. (variant 1)
If I were you, I would wait a little longer. (variant 1)
I would recommend getting expert help if I were you. (variant 1)
If I were you, I wouldn't miss that opportunity. (variant 1)
I would be more careful with that decision if I were you. (variant 1)
If I were you, I would try a different approach. (variant 1)
I wouldn't worry about that if I were you. (variant 1)
If I were you, I would practice more. (variant 1)
I would accept that offer if I were you. (variant 1)
If I were you, I would consult a doctor. (variant 2)
